description: The Upper Ruins are ancient remnants of Shandora located in Upper Yard. This area contains the ruins of the once-great city and serves as the site of Ohm's Ordeal of Iron. It features tilted buildings, sacrificial altars, and is rigged with Iron Cloud traps.

keyEvents.title: Chopper Arrives at the Upper Ruins
keyEvents.description: Chopper reaches the Upper Ruins seeking treasure and encounters Ohm.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the beginning of the confrontation with one of Enel's most powerful priests.

keyEvents.title: Chopper Defeated by Ohm
keyEvents.description: Ohm defeats Chopper in the Upper Ruins, demonstrating the 0% survival rate of the Ordeal of Iron.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the danger level of this location.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Crashes at the Upper Ruins
keyEvents.description: Zoro is dropped by the South Bird and crash-lands at the Upper Ruins.
keyEvents.significance: Brings the Straw Hats' strongest swordsman to the battleground.

keyEvents.title: Four Warriors Converge
keyEvents.description: Zoro, Wyper, Gan Fall, and Ohm all converge at the Upper Ruins for an impending battle.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up one of the most complex multi-faction battles in the Skypiea arc.

statusHistory.reason: Serves as the battleground for the Ordeal of Iron

description: Giant Jack is a massive beanstalk located in the center of Upper Yard that extends through the ruins of Shandora and up to God's Shrine. It serves as the pathway to reach Enel's location at the top of the sky island.

keyEvents.title: Wyper Reaches Giant Jack
keyEvents.description: Wyper arrives at the base of Giant Jack, declaring his intention to climb to the top and confront Enel.
keyEvents.significance: Represents the Shandians' path to confronting the god and reclaiming their homeland.

keyEvents.title: Ohm Blocks the Path
keyEvents.description: Ohm appears at Giant Jack to prevent Wyper from ascending to God's Shrine.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the priests' role as guardians of Enel's domain.

statusHistory.reason: Pathway to God's Shrine remains accessible

description: Upper Yard is the section of Jaya that was blasted into the sky 400 years ago, containing the ancient city of Shandora. It serves as the main battleground during the Skypiea arc, controlled by Enel and his priests with various ordeals.

keyEvents.title: Nola Rampages Through Upper Yard
keyEvents.description: Nola thrashes wildly through Upper Yard due to Luffy's attacks from inside, creating chaos across the battlefield.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates how interconnected events affect the entire region.

statusHistory.reason: Remains the primary battleground for conflicts in Skypiea

description: The ruins of the ancient city of Shandora, once known as the City of Gold. These ruins contain valuable archaeological information and the Poneglyph that Robin seeks. The buildings are displaced from their original positions due to the impact that sent the island into the sky.

keyEvents.title: Robin Explores the Ruins
keyEvents.description: Robin investigates the ancient city's ruins, noting discrepancies between her map and actual building locations due to the island's violent ascent.
keyEvents.significance: Advances the archaeological subplot and Robin's quest for historical truth.

statusHistory.reason: Ancient ruins remain accessible for exploration
